tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
quoteText: Some of the third parties used by edX or a Member for Cookies and Tracking Technologies offer the ability to opt-out from their tracking by following processes described on their websites. A list of some such third parties is maintained and available at the edX learner Help Center and includes, for some, links to applicable opt-out processes. Neither edX nor any Member is responsible for the effectiveness of any third-party opt-out options.
